channel.title: Pupil on Silvia Canelón

item.title: Using GazeR to Analyze Pupillometry Data
item.description: Description The Advancing Methods for Pupillometry (AMP) conference is geared around data collection and analysis methods for pupillometry. We provide a small group of around 40 participants with a series of invited talks and ample time for informal interaction. AMP2020 is entirely online. Attendence is free, but you must register, as space is limited.
